=======
CHANGES
=======

Version 1.2.0 (5/30/2007)
-------------------------

- Added ability to change the button action title using an IValue adapter.

Version 1.1.0 (5/30/2007)
-------------------------

- Added compatibility for Zope 3.3 and thus Zope 2.10.


Version 1.0.0 (5/24/2007)
-------------------------

- Initial Releas
